text: Galder Gaztelu-Urrutia (born 1974) is a Spanish director and producer. He is best known for his first feature movie, 2019's The Platform (, ). He has also directed many television advertisements. Gaztelu-Urrutia was born in Bilbao, Basque Country. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bilbao Category:Spanish movie directors Category:Spanish movie producers
title: Galder Gaztelu-Urrutia
